text: Advice to all teens no matter who you are from a guy who will soon be    Focus on your grades junior and senior year of high school  they are the most important years to study and where you could end up going to college  if that s your plan  otherwise vocational schooling is a big step up into any trade you want Even though studying is important  you shouldn t make that your whole life  Be social  get involved with clubs and online groups  make friends and connections that will last you  and them  a life time  Everyone that I ve met when it came to their high school years always ended up regretting not being more outgoing with the opportunities presented to them Respect and understand everyone you come into contact throughout the years  you don t know what kind of life they are living as the same it is back to you  you could end up helping others or even saving life with the simplest of actions of kindness or just being a shoulder for them to cry on or ears for them to talk to  We re in this together   If you have interests you want to get deeper into  find work and save the money you get from it  Even if it s the fewest of dollars that you save  in the long run it will help you greatly finance any of the ambitions you wish to go for   Lastly  your future is important but your present is even more important  Live in the now and enjoy the memories you make  do your best to break out of your shell and try new things even if they scare you or make you uncomfortable  there s so much to life when you keep trying   I hope this can help at least one person and sorry if this ends up being formatted bad  mobile loser
summary: Focus on your grades in junior and senior year of high school. Be social and make connections that will last you and others a life time. Find a job and save the money you get from it. Live in the now and enjoy the memories you make.
cleaned: focus grade junior senior year high school social connection life time find job save money live enjoy memory
